html:
Pronunciation[edit]

  • (Classical) IPA(key): /ˈad.ɡe.roː/, [ˈad̪.ɡɛ.roː]
  • (Ecclesiastical) IPA(key): /ˈad.d͡ʒe.ro/, [ˈad.d͡ʒɛ.rɔ]

Etymology 1[edit]

From ad- +‎ gerō (“bear, carry”).

Verb[edit]

adgerō (present infinitive adgerere, perfect active adgessī, supine adgestum); third conjugation

  1. Alternative form of aggerō
Conjugation[edit]

Etymology 2[edit]

From agger (“rampart, bulwark”).

Verb[edit]

adgerō (present infinitive adgerāre, perfect active adgerāvī, supine adgerātum); first conjugation

  1. Alternative form of aggerō
Conjugation[edit]
